PRIVATE EVENTS

BOOK AN EVENT

If you have any questions or would like to make arrangements for parties with 15 or more guests, our team will be happy to assist you. Please expect a prompt response with the necessary details.

For parties comprising 7 to 14 guests, kindly contact us via email at skybar@casablancaprague.cz.

Our dedicated staff will assist you in ensuring your event is planned to perfection.
